channel.title: Twitter / Favorites from juancmuller
channel.description: Twitter updates favorited by Juan C. Muller / juancmuller.

item.title: shitmydadsays: "It's never the right time to have kids, but it's always the right time for screwing. God's not a dumbshit. He knows how it works."
item.description: shitmydadsays: "It's never the right time to have kids, but it's always the right time for screwing. God's not a dumbshit. He knows how it works."

item.title: shitmydadsays: "A mule kicked Uncle Bob once. Broke his ribs. He punched it in the face.. My point? You have an ingrown fucking toenail. Stop bitching."
item.description: shitmydadsays: "A mule kicked Uncle Bob once. Broke his ribs. He punched it in the face.. My point? You have an ingrown fucking toenail. Stop bitching."

item.title: shitmydadsays: "Son, no one gives a shit about all the things your cell phone does. You didn't invent it, you just bought it. Anybody can do that."
item.description: shitmydadsays: "Son, no one gives a shit about all the things your cell phone does. You didn't invent it, you just bought it. Anybody can do that."

item.title: shitmydadsays: "That woman was sexy...Out of your league? Son. Let women figure out why they won't screw you, don't do it for them."
item.description: shitmydadsays: "That woman was sexy...Out of your league? Son. Let women figure out why they won't screw you, don't do it for them."

item.title: shitmydadsays: "You're gonna run into jerk offs. But remember, it's not the size of the asshole you worry about, it's how much shit comes out of it."
item.description: shitmydadsays: "You're gonna run into jerk offs. But remember, it's not the size of the asshole you worry about, it's how much shit comes out of it."

item.title: shitmydadsays: "Here's a strawberry, sorry for farting near you...Hey! Either take the strawberry and stop bitching, or no strawberry, that's the deal."
item.description: shitmydadsays: "Here's a strawberry, sorry for farting near you...Hey! Either take the strawberry and stop bitching, or no strawberry, that's the deal."

item.title:
laughingbovine: Warning: cool #linux command. Avert eyes.
screen -r your_currently_running_session -X screen -t new_window_name command_to_run
item.description:
laughingbovine: Warning: cool #linux command. Avert eyes.
screen -r your_currently_running_session -X screen -t new_window_name command_to_run

item.title: agideon: .@Wills42 A coworker does the same thing with Ubuntu/Virtualbox on his #Linux laptop. It all Just Works regardless.
item.description: agideon: .@Wills42 A coworker does the same thing with Ubuntu/Virtualbox on his #Linux laptop. It all Just Works regardless.

item.title: hotdogsladies: You eventually learn that true priorities are like arms; if you think you have more than a couple, you're either lying or crazy.
item.description: hotdogsladies: You eventually learn that true priorities are like arms; if you think you have more than a couple, you're either lying or crazy.
